Articles.Content:
Hello,

Don\'t really know what to say,

I\'v been lurking here the past few weeks, have 2 or 3 post on my name.. (so proud)

I\'m from the Netherlands.. from there live there..

I started playing kerbal space program a few weeks ago.

I learned from it through a minute article on a dutch gaming site.

I started playing the free version, and at the end of the day I bought the game.

Now I thought lets post a few pictures of a few missions.

My first true successful ship, its a SDSC - Semi Deep Space Craft, its now on a steep trajectory out of the suns influence.

Name: Gaia III

Now here is my first successful Lunar Base

Name: Mun Base VII

And my latest rescue mission. (The command pod underneath the solar panel lander leg is the stranded pod)

Name: Resc II

So thats it for now, greetings to you all, and happy launching.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager

Hallo,

Leuk dat er nog een Nederlander bij het forum bijkomt. Er zitten veel Nederlanders hier op het forum.

Zeer goeie missies voor je eerste keren. Hoe heb je de gedownloadde parts op de juiste schaal gekregen?

Mvg Kevin
